name: Food Delivery Dashboard UI
description:
Everyone loves food. It‚Äôs a universal fact! üòã


Speed up and simplify your business with our newly designed web dashboard for food delivery.


The customers, restaurants, and delivery boys can manage the operations seamlessly in this web app.


Here, POS systems can help restaurants deliver the best services to their customers. Customers can easily search for their favorite restaurants & food with hassle-free payment options, and the delivery boys can track their daily work.


We have used the best color scheme for a clean UI in this shot, leaving the food app looking classic and elegant.


What do you think about the UI of this web app development? Your suggestions are always welcomed. Don't forget to Like ‚ù§ it :)
